item.title: UAW Secures Union Victory At Ford's Kentucky EV Battery Plant, Calls Out 'Anti-Democratic' Tactics
item.description: UAW claims victory at Ford's Kentucky plant, urges it to drop anti-democratic efforts as company kicks off production at new EV facility. read more

item.title: Google Slashes Over A Third Of Managers Leading Small Teams Over Past Year: Report
item.description: Alphabet Inc. has reportedly eliminated 35% of managers overseeing teams of three employees or fewer over the past year. read more
